General.Name: Carlsberg Brewery Malaysia Bhd
General.Description: Carlsberg Brewery Malaysia Berhad, together with its subsidiaries, produces, distributes, and markets beer, stout, cider, shandy, liquor, and non-alcoholic beverages in Malaysia, Singapore, and internationally. It offers its products under the Asahi, Jing-A, Brooklyn, Tuborg Strong, Carlsberg Alcohol Free Wheat, Carlsberg Smooth Drought, Carlsberg Danish Pilsner, 1664, Connar's Stout Porter, Somersby, Somersby Apple 0.0, SKOL, and Royal Stout brands. The company was incorporated in 1969 and is headquartered in Shah Alam, Malaysia. Carlsberg Brewery Malaysia Berhad is a subsidiary of Carlsberg Breweries A/S.
